class.name: OScriptNodeVariableGet
class.brief_description: Returns the value of a specific orchestration variable.
class.description: The [OScriptNodeVariableGet] node is used to return the value of an orchestration variable. The output pin returns the value currently assigned in the orchestration variable. If the variable has not been assigned, it will return the variable type's default value, which may be [code]null[/code].
